name: blocky
tagline: A fast DNS proxy providing ad blocking, caching, and traffic filtering
description: Blocky is a fast and lightweight DNS proxy with support for ad blocking, filtering, caching, and customizable blocking strategies. It is ideal for home networks and can be installed within Docker or Kubernetes environments.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Fast, lightweight DNS server with advanced features. Network-level control

features.title: Custom Filtering
features.description: Create personalized blocking rules and strategies. Tailored protection

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Improve performance with intelligent caching. Faster responses

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Easy deployment in containerized environments. Simple setup

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Native integration for K8s deployments. Cloud-native
